pages.text: Completly flat world with only dirt and grass.$(br2)In this mode shift right clicking grass blocks with both hands empty will get you stone pebbles.$(br2)Various additional recipes added for common resources such as sand, gravel and clay.$(br2)Saplings can also be converted into other saplings by crafting then in your crafting table.
Lava and water ceramic buckets can be crafted using redstone and lapis.$(br2)Seeds can be found in villages
